I even set the high expectation that our Kiva Team can even achieve loaning $1,000,000 with the help of others.  I teach the kids 2 mottos: 

Live simply that others may simply live. - Ghandi

We must be the change we wish to see in the world. - Ghandi

I enjoy the process of reading about the them, I'm interested in their stories, in their hopes and dreams. To Kiva is somewhat addictive, I keep coming back and loaning again, especially when I need a boost.

lenders.name: Zal
lenders.loan_because: As Albert Schweitzer says, "Wherever a man [or woman] turns, he can find someone who needs him."

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It is very fulfilling to be able to fund entrepreneurs around the world. I find Kiva an amazing, brilliant and game changing service.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I study law at a university.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometimes.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the main cook in a busy but small restaurant.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who need a hand to get started, or to maintain their current business. I have a little extra I can spare, so I'm happy to share it.
lenders.occupational_info: I help the webmaster of an international conservation organization by editing the text on the website to make sure the pages are easily understood by the reader, and also to make sure there are no errors in the text. I work as a volunteer.

lenders.name: Leah
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about gardening and raising animals.I am blessed to have what I need and want to help others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Collect plasma (a blood product) from donors to make life saving medication

lenders.name: Duckie
lenders.loan_because: it's a direct way of helping someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I made books by hand, both the covers and the pages.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I recently started my own business.  The process has been so educational and invigorating. It has prompted me to lift other woman up so that they are able to experience the same sense of joy and pride that I have had the pleasure of experiencing.
lenders.occupational_info: I actually have three jobs. I am a mother to two  small children, I am an interventional Technologist ( I assist Doctor's in taking specialized x-rays of the organs and blood vessels of the body, and I am a small business owner in which I care for other peoples pets when they are traveling.

lenders.name: Kiyome
lenders.loan_because: why wouldn't I

lenders.name: Zach
lenders.loan_because: I would want someone to do the same for me and I also believe that by doing something good today something even better will happen tomorrow.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: there are people that need more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell advertising space on the internet.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because:
although I am a student and I struggle to pay for things in my life, I feel extremely fortunate compared to the struggles that many people face in the world.  I am passionate about helping women across the world become more confident and independent, both personally and financially. I wish you the best of luck!

Aunque yo sea estudiante y en este momento yo tampoco puedo pagar por todo lo que necesito, siento extremamente afortunada comparado con mucha gente en el mundo.  Me apasiona ayudar a las mujeres del mundo tener mas confianza y independencia, economicamente y personalmente. Suerte!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a university student, studying Global Studies and Environmental Studies.  I hope to work for an international non-profit environmental organization in the near future.

lenders.name: Kevin M. Doyle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others less fortunate than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the field of biodiversity conservation and land rights.

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: I like to see how the money will grow and help people.
lenders.occupational_info: nerdy stuff

lenders.name: Luc
lenders.loan_because: I believe in human being power, like ants we can build a better world, even with very small income, everyone can do something.
lenders.occupational_info: Is it important?

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: We are all part of one another. Sharing makes me feel connected.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother and grandmother with a loving partner who supports me so I don't need to work for money.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I have had amazing opportunities in my life; opportunities that wouldn't have been there without the funding I recieved from a local children's charity and my college.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm researching mathematicsat the University of Bristol. I work on Random Matrix theory, which means I am applying techniques from various areas of mathematics to understand primes and the zeros of L-functions.

lenders.name: Sophia
lenders.loan_because: i believe in microloans
lenders.occupational_info: in healthcare

lenders.name: Duan & Colin
lenders.loan_because: In our few short years together, we have had to start our lives over several times already. By helping others to begin again, we hope to help people find stability and self-sufficiency.  We also hope that we can encourage others to look outside themselves and find ways to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people do well in business, and we all need a little help at times.
lenders.occupational_info: We own a roofing and guttering business, working on both residential and commercial properties.

lenders.name: nguyen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who try to help themselves

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in someone's ability to support himself/herself.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software that helps newspapers.

lenders.name: Dancingdots
lenders.loan_because: The amount of money it takes to make life a bit easier is so little, I will add more when I am able to.  Hopefully, I can convince more of my friends and co-workers to joint me at this.
lenders.occupational_info: I make nice and comfortable clothing for other people.

lenders.name: Rui Martins
lenders.occupation: Membro da Comissão Executiva do MIL
lenders.loan_because: Porque acredito que é possível desenvolver os povos dos países lusófonos através de micro-crédito
lenders.occupational_info: Tecnologias de Informação

lenders.name: chales
lenders.occupation: An accountant in nigeria loaning agency

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I love hearing the personal stories.  I have been lucky in life, and I want to help others' fortunes.
